Reviews.Title: WoW!
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I used this camera to shot aerial pictures from our Cessna 172.  Even with a little turbulence and haze, the pictures and video were incredilbe.  Only drawback is that it doesn't fit in my pocket but  the picture quality makes up for that. Wish I could post one of the pictures I took.

Reviews.Title: BRILLIANT POINT and SHOOT
Reviews.Author: Andrew P. Simmons
Reviews.Content: I needed a point and shoot since that is all I know how to do. But this camera is so much more than a point and shoot! I had no idea of its capabilities until after I ordered it. While I was waiting for it to come I decided to watch Youtube videos to see what I was getting.I learned so much from this guy! He explains, and demonstrates, how excellent the pictures are on point and shoot, and shows that the zoom is brilliant! But he also shows you that this is the only point and shoot which you can grow with IF you want to. In other words, if you want to do more than point and shoot with this camera it offers options for you to choose your "aperture, depth of field and lighting." I haven't done any of that, but it is all there on the camera IF you want to learn. I took a photo shooting directly into the sun, looking across the bay, and it came out beautifully! The camera does all the adjusting for lighting, even when pointing into the sun. Shots I took of the Olympic mountain range? Crystal clear and gorgeous! The zoom is powerful. Here is the guy to watch if you want to see all this camera is capable of. Great guy. So glad I found him on Youtube: Canon Powershot SX500is Camera Review MWESTPhotography

Reviews.Title: great camera, price and accessories
Reviews.Author: Nicole Tourgee
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a camera with a lot of zoom to get better pictures. I really like this camera. The pictures come out great. It is easy to use. The accessories that came with it are a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: Long time Canon owner
Reviews.Author: jwaand
Reviews.Content: I currently own 6 Canon camera's, this one gives me the super zoom (30x opitical 4x digital total of 120x) in an extremely compact size. Does everything I want photos and video, and easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: great camera great opt zoom 30x
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: Just got back from an African trip, 2 week safari, took over almost 1000 pics killed two batteries, had a third and its almost dead.  If I had any complaint at all it would be battery life.  Most of the time you wont be living in a tent camp so prob. won't be an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Cpl Shawn Snyder
Reviews.Content: Bought this before a big trip and couldn't be happier.  It arrived on time (needed overnight).  The value for what you pay is amazing.Tired of point and shoots with no control, and this has plenty of control for many levels of comfort.  The image stabilizing had me impressed.  16MP of quality resolution - not grainy, and the colors you want come through (even that glacier blue ;) ).  Has a fast enough shutter for almost any situation.  With standard 30x lens/120x digital, you get great zoom without needing to buy an additional lens (though that's always an option).  I always stay within the 30x lens zoom if I can help it, though because any digital zoom on any camera will start eating away at quality.I bought this kit because I didn't care to go looking 30 other places for accessories and probably end up paying more total.  This has every thing you need for a great start, and even some very helpful extras.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
Reviews.Author: Steff
Reviews.Content: You get it all plus more.  I received it just in time for my daughters high school graduation and I was very thankful as we were seated at the back of the auditorium. If it was not for this camera my husband would have never been able to see what was going on; but thanks to the amazing zoom we did not miss one photo op! The pictures are clear and the flash does a surprisingly good job.  I come from a family of photographers and you can never go wrong with a Cannon! In fact this was a gift to me so I could hand my 2 year old power shot to my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Talia
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the zoom. I am not a photographer just a mom with busy kids. The camera is everything that I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Failed to work properly at 4 mos old
Reviews.Author: Julia J Johnson
Reviews.Content: Im VERY Un HAPPY it quite working properly at 4 mos old. and couldn't get help with issues. and this sucks

Reviews.Title: Leaky Cleaning solvent
Reviews.Author: Harold Anderson
Reviews.Content: My only problem was the cleaning fluid had leaked out of the bottle and ruined the other articles inside the sealed bag. Nothing was able to get on the camera just the contents of the sealed bag.

Reviews.Title: Good zoom!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Siddons
Reviews.Content: I was not aware that the flash is manual, or that there is no eyepiece/viewfinder, but overall, this camera takes great pictures, and it is fairly simple to figure out. The zoom is excellent! I can't wait to use it on my next vacation!I loved this bundle because it covers pretty much everything you need, so it is great for a first-timer.

Reviews.Title: Not What I expected
Reviews.Author: Pat Kelly
Reviews.Content: The camera preforms well but it is not what I expected.  I should have looked into its capabilities more.  I was under the impression that I could take several pictures a second.  I have  not been able to do that unless it is in movie mode.  I wanted to take But it does take good pictures.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera
Reviews.Author: joy carter
Reviews.Content: The photos are amazing and the camera's 30x optical allows for excellent range.  Also, there is a "discreet" setting so you can snap away and people do not hear the shutter.  Great feature.  The kit that came with the camera had everything I need.  Love the card reader, too.

Reviews.Title: I still can't figure out where the pictures are going when they download
Reviews.Author: Ravenlyn
Reviews.Content: and I'm reasonably computer savvy.  I got rid of the dopey Canon Gateway or whatever it was, and just want it to download wirelessly to my pictures folder, which was the whole point of getting this camera.  I think I may need to uninstall the software, and start over, being careful where I tell it to put the pictures now that I know I don't want the Gateway.  Really.  I've spent way too much time on this.However, the camera itself is a lot of fun, takes great pictures, and it's small but not too small. I love the one-touch movie button.  I did spend time with the manual, which let me make sure I knew how to run the menus, because they are not especially intuitive.  But at least THAT time with the manual left me knowing something!  (bitter?  not at all.)So I'm sorry that it's not more straightforward to deal with the wireless and that the menus require learning and review, but other than that, it's a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, Nice Price
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera! Simple to use and takes really nice pictures. if  you are looking for a simple camera on a budget, this is the one for you!

Reviews.Title: Great, easy camera
Reviews.Author: Monica Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and the bundle it came with is perfect. The camera was easy to set up and use. The pictures came out clear. I am glad it came with a great bundle, such as the extra battery and the case. I am not camera-savvy, and this is easy to use. I would recommend this for a good basic easy to use camera.

Reviews.Title: Everything You Need!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for a young starting photographer journalist.  The best thing about this product is convenience.  Everything you need in one fell swoop.  It arrived in less than 48 hours.  What's more, all of the accessories unpackage and fit perfectly into the case.  One minor detail is that the extra battery is not a Canon brand battery.  I will order one of these for myself next month!

Reviews.Title: Love it!  It takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera outfit right before we went on vacation to Disney World and it was great.  Took great pictures and it was a bargain with all the accessories that were included.  The life of the battery held for nearly 4 days of picture taking before I had to put the other battery in.  I saw this exact same camera with no accessories at a local discount department for over $450.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary Jane Mazur
Reviews.Content: It is a perfect size for me and takes great pictures.  The price was perfect, easily affordable.  The pictures I print are clear and precise.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera hard to learn
Reviews.Author: Leslie A. Freiborg
Reviews.Content: A little hard to learn, you have to print your own Manuel  No stop action that we can figure out. Really not much of an up grade from our old camera

Reviews.Title: feed back
Reviews.Author: Frank McCoullum
Reviews.Content: lots of features to choose from better pictures, great looks, and easy to carry around  goog coverage eye catcher and good to have a reliable camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera with professional like results (without all the work like a professional !)
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: Camera is amazing with results like a professional, but easy to use. Bought it for trip to the Northwest U.S.  We are so pleased with the pictures and how close-up it was able to reach, and how crystal clear the pictures were. Would highly recommend this camera for any non-professional photographer, but still loves taking pictures of scenery. Bought the package because I thought it would be helpful instead if trying to buy by the piece.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great deal!!!
Reviews.Author: konstanty
Reviews.Content: Very happy and satisfied with this camera, zoom is awesome and so far easy to use. Def would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS
Reviews.Author: Joe D. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price. Easy to use. Has more functions, features, and accessories than I need. The big bag that comes with the camera will hold all the toys and gizmos that comes with it. I didn't want to have to carry all that stuff around just to use the camera. So I bought a smaller carrying case that I can hang around my neck or clip to my belt.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Stacy Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for a recent trip overseas and was very happy with the easy of use and quality of the photos. Extra backup battery was very handy. Only thing is the camera bag is too large and bulky. We purchased a much smaller one which was easier to carry around. But overall a terrific buy!

Reviews.Title: Coments on SX500IS
Reviews.Author: Jeannie L. Rogers
Reviews.Content: No complaints so far. Only had it 2 months and have taken hundreds of pics. Haven't quite figured out all the settings, but that's not the camera's fault. This is my 3rd Canon and I wouldn't consider anything else.

Reviews.Title: love the camera and package deal
Reviews.Author: Elaine Bolton
Reviews.Content: Great camera and takes great pictures. Loved getting all of the extras with it and the price was great.  Very compact and easy to use. Love point and click cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great. Lovely pictures.
Reviews.Author: yamilet lopez
Reviews.Content: I chose it because I have an old canon power shot camera. I wanted a newer version. I love it.

Reviews.Title: I would recommend it...
Reviews.Author: Smartee
Reviews.Content: Purchased about a month ago. Have used a lot. I like the easy to use features. I find the camera bag a bit large because I only tote the camera and not a lot of accessories. The memory card usually costs more than $30 separately so this is a good deal.The only con I can see is that the focusing is not always great when you get close up. I mean it does not focus as clearly very close up even on macro setting. Otherwise the pictures are amazing and it makes me look like a better photographer than I really am. Nice and lightweight camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Black) + NB-6L Battery +...
Reviews.Author: sagar
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  32 GB memory card is excellent but other items in the  bundle are average at this price. Other comment after fully used.

Reviews.Title: A very nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Joe Bowen
Reviews.Content: Takes GREAT shots! Would recommend to anybody that takes a lot of pictures. The zoom works well also for the size of camera.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Cynthia S. Manicki
Reviews.Content: Although I have not taken many pics with it yet, those I have are great. They are very clear and crisp.  It's also very easy to operate.  So far, so good!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS bundle has light weight, long battery life, and takes great photos!
Reviews.Author: William Leonard
Reviews.Content: I purchased the bundle and it far exceeded my expectations.  I had been looking at SLR cameras, but chose this camera instead.  I believe this camera cannot be beat for price, ease of use, zoom capability, long battery life, and picture quality combined.  Yes, you could spend several thousand dollars for a heavy camera, but probably not be able to taker better photos.  I took this camera to Rocky Mountain National Park for two days of hiking, fishing, and sight-seeing, and have fifty quality photos.  The beauty of this camera is you have the zoom capability without the inconvenience of a huge camera and lens.  I have not even read the manual, but with auto mode, you can take quality photos right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: C. D. Codd-perez
Reviews.Content: My husband ordered this camera because our son had our Canon Rebel for his photography class.  It is a good little camera.  It takes good photos and video and was worth the money we spent for it.

Reviews.Title: great camera package
Reviews.Author: Chipper L. Caswell
Reviews.Content: This package is great. It has the camera and all the accessories you will need to shoot and display your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Bour
Reviews.Content: I have owned many cameras, and this is the best!  It is very easy to operate and the pictures are beautiful.  The zoom lens is an added bonus.  I checked out this camera at many places and Amazon had the best price.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Review
Reviews.Author: CT
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome!!! It takes amazing pictures and came with a bunch of stuff.  I'm so glad I bought it! It's a great compromise if you don't want to get a $2000 camera but still want a camera that takes quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: Got it for my grandson's graduation and he loves it. Seem like a good quality camera for the price. Well pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: 2nd. purchase for 2nd. daughter
Reviews.Author: frank allison
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera bundle for my daughters birthday, and she loves it. My second daughter borrowed the camera from her siater, and she also raved about it. So I ordered a 2nd. bundle which I will give her for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: cannon power shot
Reviews.Author: Delia
Reviews.Content: easy to use and has everything you need is  included in the package and the camera takes great photos.What mopre could you ask for

Reviews.Title: This may be the best camera I have ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Young
Reviews.Content: I have owned lots of cameras over the years, but for the few days I have had this camera I love it. The pictures are stunning. The video is as good as any video camera I have used in a long time. For the money, this camera is hard to beat. After I have used it for  a longer time I will write another review. So far, I Iove it.

Reviews.Title: Took forever but in the end it was worth it.
Reviews.Author: Stacie Jones
Reviews.Content: The package arrived over two weeks after the "last expected day" . Granted it was over the Christmas holidays, but I was still annoyed at its tardiness.  In the end I found the Camera  to be exactly want I wanted and the additional accessories to be a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for not so expert photographers
Reviews.Author: Abhishek Sharma
Reviews.Content: Buy this product when you think you just want to click a photograph and all technicalities are taken care automatically.

Reviews.Title: Worth the $$$
Reviews.Author: S. Keen
Reviews.Content: Decent all around point and shoot camera for its price point.  It's small, easy to use and takes great pictures.  I also have a Canon PowerShot SX 50, and it is much, much better.  If you can afford the SX50, go for it, because you will be happier with it (unless you need the SX500's smaller body).

Reviews.Title: Great camera. Love it !
Reviews.Author: fejdude daddy
Reviews.Content: This camera has good focus. It produces high quality pictures for it's level of a camera. The video is average quality, but that wasn't the main focus for buying this camera. The battery life is also very good. Would definitely buy another Canon product again.

Reviews.Title: Powershot SX50
Reviews.Author: Mary I. Maslayak "Mary I."
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the Canon Powershot SX50 camera because I needed a lighter and more transportable camera than my Nikon to take to family events.  I chose Canon because I have mild tremors and Canon has excellent image stabilization when I do candids.  It also produces high quality images because of it's 16 MP and the zoom range is great for sneaking up on children acting naturally.  In addition, the Powershot SX500 with the bundle is an wonderful value.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: bev Glass
Reviews.Content: I am happy with Canon camera's. have used Canon camera's for many years and have been very happy with each camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 10 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 30x Wide-Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Black)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional NB-6L Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery - Focus Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap
Focus Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Focus Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI Cable for direct connection to HDTV - 25 FREE Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX500 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Black) + NB-6L Battery + 8pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit
